objects.text:
• Spacious stylish design with ample storage
• Premium gold hardware accents
• Perfect medium size for everyday use

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
The banner features a modern and elegant promotional layout for a fashion accessory. A split background separates the composition vertically, with the left half in a soft beige tone and the right half in a lighter off-white. Decorative lines and abstract circles enhance the sophisticated tone. The main headline (`heading`) at the top uses bold uppercase typography to command attention. Just below it is a refined subheading (`subheading`) identifying the product. Three bullet-point details (`description`) highlight the item's features. The price (`price`) stands out prominently, and a visually engaging call-to-action button (`cta`) with contrasting text encourages interaction. A product image (`product_image`) occupies the right side, adding focus. 

**Color Palette:**
- Beige (#F2E6D5)
- Off-white (#F8F3EA)
- Warm brown (#8B5A2B)
- Gold-brown (#BF8F5E)
- Soft taupe (#6D4C41)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated handbag in a warm, muted camel brown (#A97C65) that exudes elegance and versatility. The material has a lightly textured finish that adds depth while maintaining a smooth aesthetic. Accents of polished metallic gold (#D4AF37) are prominently featured in the handles’ hardware, brand logo, and hanging charms, providing a luxurious contrast against the matte brown. These gold elements catch the light, creating visual interest without clashing. For an advertisement banner, a color palette of camel brown (#A97C65), metallic gold (#D4AF37), soft ivory (#F8F5F0), and muted taupe (#B19584) would maintain harmony and highlight the product’s chic, classy appeal.
